info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-urwbnet-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions
     for URWB(Ultra Reliable Wireless Backhaul) network global
     operational data.
     Copyright (c) 2025 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Wireless
**Paths:** 9
